hero_h1: We safely import from China to Saudi Arabia.
hero_h2: From China to your doorstep, fast and secure shipping for all your products.
about_us_desc: We provide comprehensive services to traders, including purchasing and shipping products from China to Saudi Arabia, with the best logistics solutions and warehouse services. We help our customers obtain high-quality products at competitive prices from trusted suppliers and stores in China. Additionally, we offer secure and flexible storage services in our warehouses in China to ensure your products are ready for shipping and delivery efficiently. We also provide customs clearance services to ensure your goods arrive quickly and easily. Our goal is to simplify the import process for our customers and ensure their products arrive quickly and safely.
buy_from_china_desc: We offer a unique opportunity to get products from China easily and reliably, without the need to travel or deal directly with Chinese suppliers. Customers can browse Chinese products in Arabic via our platform and choose what suits them in terms of quality and price, in the quantities they need. My CN acts as a trusted intermediary that ensures customers receive their products from reliable Chinese suppliers and stores, saving them the trouble of searching and the concern of dealing with unknown suppliers.
logistics_services_desc: A service that allows you to have your own postal address in China at our warehouses, which you can use to receive your shipments from anywhere. When the goods arrive at the address, we register them on your control panel, allowing you to monitor what arrives. You can also request to inspect the goods to ensure their quality, or consolidate multiple shipments to reduce shipping costs.
shipping_from_china_desc: Fast and secure shipping from China, the US, and Turkey to all parts of the world. The customer is given a private address at our warehouses in China, the US, Turkey, or Saudi Arabia to store and consolidate products, and ship them to any address they want, whether by sea or air, including all customs clearance procedures through various shipping companies and door-to-door delivery.
why_us_heading-test: Your ideal partner in purchasing and shipping products from China
why_us_box_one: We provide reliable Chinese products at the lowest prices
why_us_box_two: Product photography upon arrival to ensure quality
why_us_box_five: We handle customs clearance to ensure fast delivery
why_us_box_six_sub: (Visa, MasterCard, Mada, Apple Pay, Bank Transfer)
enterprise_package_subhead: If you're a bulk trader or company, contact us for our best package and discounts.
customer_reviews_subhead: We are proud to create profitable trade for our clients and always strive to deliver the best.
faisal_al_Harbi_quote: Thank you for the excellent technical support team for all inquiries, fast responses, Mashallah.
naif_al_otaibi_quote: What you provide is really amazing and serves many customers passionate about buying from Chinese sites, saving many of them time.
allam_mohammed_quote: After this pandemic that affected the world, you managed to commit to delivery dates and follow up on orders. Thank you very much, and keep up the good work.
send_your_inquiry_we_will_respond: Send your inquiry and we will respond as soon as possible.
everything_new_sent_you_email: Everything new is sent to you via email.
stay_in_continuous_contact_with_us: Stay in Continuous Contact with Us
have_a_question: Have a question? Send us your inquiry using the form below, and the MyCN team will get in touch with you.
your_request_has_been_successfully: Your request has been sent successfully.
we_will_contact_soon_possible: We will contact you as soon as possible.
phone_number_must_be_14_digits: Phone number must be at least 14 digits
message_must_least_10_characters: Message must be at least 10 characters
